## Checklist

- [ ] Title follows conventional commits (e.g. feat:, fix:, docs:, chore:)

- [ ] Tests added/updated (if code changes)
- [ ] Docs updated

## Docs gatekeeping

- [ ] All modified files under docs/ include required frontmatter:
  ```yaml
  ---
  title: <Concise page title>
  owner: <@github-handle or team>
  last_reviewed: YYYY-MM-DD
  ---
  ```
- [ ] If introducing or changing public APIs, added/updated relevant docs
